Maths
Class AbstractMatrix

java.lang.Object
  Maths.AbstractMatrix
Direct Known Subclasses:
BandMatrix, Matrix
public abstract class AbstractMatrix
extends java.lang.Object

Abstract implementation of a Matrix.

This class offers the basic functionalities for a matrix.

Author:
sebastianzillessen

decomposePenta

public AbstractMatrix[] decomposePenta()
                                throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Decomposes a matrix if it is pentadiagonale.

Returns:
two matrizes [L, U] with L * U = this, L contains only entries lower then the diagonale and the diagonale entries are 1, U contains only entries over or on the diagonale.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the matrix is not pentadiagonale this error is thrown.

equals

public boolean equals(java.lang.Object o)
Checks if two matrices are the same.

Overrides:
equals in class java.lang.Object
Parameters:
o - other matrix
Returns:
true if each entry is the exactly the same in each matrix and the size equals as well.

get

public abstract double get(int row,
                           int col)
returns a value in the matrix. if the value has not been set yet it returns 0.

Parameters:
row - row of the matrix element.
col - col of the matrix element
Returns:
the value of the matrix in this position. if not set, then it returns 0.
Throws:
java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the row or col are not in the matrix range.

isPentadiagonale

public boolean isPentadiagonale()
Checks if a matrix is pentadiagonale (only the diagonale and the two elements next to it are set, so special form of a band matrix)

Returns:
true if pentadiagonale

isQuadratic

public boolean isQuadratic()
Checks if a matrix is quadratic

Returns:
quadratic (rows == cols)

mult

public abstract AbstractMatrix mult(double a)
multiplication of this matrix with a real value. Each element of the matrix gets multiplied by a.

Parameters:
a - value to multiply this matrix
Returns:
multiplied istance of this matrix. For a = 1 the same matrix is returned.

mult

public Vector mult(double[] x)
Multiplies a matrix with a vector (vector is represented by the array of real numbers).

Parameters:
x - vector to multiply this matrix with
Returns:
result of A * x
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the Vector doesn't match the size of the matrix (x.length() != this.cols())

mult

public Vector mult(Vector x)
Multiplies a matrix with a vector.

Parameters:
x - vector to multiply this matrix with
Returns:
result of A * x
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the Vector doesn't match the size of the matrix (x.length() != this.cols())

parse

public static AbstractMatrix parse(java.lang.String s)
Parses a string representation of a matrix to a matrix.

Format has to be: 0 0 0 0 ... 0 0 0 0 (rows seperated by \n and entries seperated by space).

Parameters:
s - string representation (see above)
Returns:
a matrix defined by the string

toFile

public void toFile(java.lang.String filename)
Saves a matrix to a file in text form. This is handeld asynchron and does not return any errors, if the save process failed.

Parameters:
filename - the filename where to save it.

toFileSync

Stores a matrix in a file.

Parameters:
filename - the file where to save it.
Returns:
true if the file was stored, false if not.
